name: Super Benji All-Stars
description:
This is a remake of the first four games we ever made!! (They are on Scratch, by the way.)

If you fall, you die. Press the green flag on the top-left corner to play again.

Use left + right to move, SPACE to jump, and there are portals to a secret level!

Now that we're at All Stars we have Up as an alternate way to jump.

☆ALL-STARS ONLY☆

Use 1, 2, 3, and 4 to play each of the games.

Here are the 4 games:

Super Benji

Super Benji 2

Super Benji Universe

Super Benji Castle

We worked together on them - I did code, he did art and level design.
